statements: DELETE FROM SmartGridFaultDetection WHERE device_id = 123 AND is_resolved = FALSE
DELETE FROM outage_management WHERE location = 'Main Street' AND outage_type = 'Power Outage';
DELETE FROM outage_management WHERE affected_devices > 10 AND outage_type = 'Planned';
DELETE FROM RealTimeData WHERE device_id = 5 AND data_type = 'temperature';
DELETE FROM FaultDetection WHERE device_id = 123 AND fault_type = 'hardware';
DELETE FROM RealTimeData WHERE data_type = 'temperature' AND data_value < 20.0;
DELETE FROM OutageManagement WHERE outage_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM Outages WHERE line_id = '9ff3d4ad-6fac-4d2a-b0c4-08f0feaee4ac' AND start_time = '2022-10-15 08:00:00';
